entities.description: The age at which the respondent first used a cigarette, including imputed data.
Indicator of whether the cigarette age of first use is based on questionnaire data, logically assigned data, statistically imputed data, or if the respondent never used a cigarette.
The year in which the respondent first used a cigarette, including imputed data.
The age at which the respondent first used a cigarette daily, including imputed data.
Indicator of whether the daily cigarette age of first use is based on questionnaire data, statistically imputed data, or if the respondent never used a cigarette daily.
The year in which the respondent first used a cigarette daily, including imputed data.
The age at which the respondent first used a cigar, including imputed data.

relationships.description: Indicates the age the respondent first used a cigarette.
Specifies the imputation indicator for the respondent's age of first cigarette use.
Indicates the year the respondent first used a cigarette.
Indicates the age the respondent first used a cigarette daily.
Specifies the imputation indicator for the respondent's age of first daily cigarette use.
Indicates the year the respondent first used a cigarette daily.
Indicates the age the respondent first used a cigar.
